title: 1.15 Exodus III: The Contract with God at Sinai
itunes:title: Exodus III: The Contract with God at Sinai
description: This is the defining moment in the history of the Israelites, where they swear allegiance to God in return for a special relationship with the divinity. I discuss how this contract follows the suzerainity treaties of the Hittites and Assyrians. I also throw in a discussion on the Ten Commandments, and how the Jews and various Christian denominations slice and dice them.
content:encoded: This is the defining moment in the history of the Israelites, where they swear allegiance to God in return for a special relationship with the divinity. I discuss how this contract follows the suzerainity treaties of the Hittites and Assyrians. I also throw in a discussion on the Ten Commandments, and how the Jews and various Christian denominations slice and dice them.
itunes:subtitle: The Israelites swear an eternal covenant with God.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
